translated: one should imagine a white OṀ, a red ĀḤ, a black HŪṀ, and a blue HŪṀ.

original: de nas yi ge las 'od zer 'phros te /
analyzed: de nas yi ge las 'od zer 'phros te /
translated: Then light rays radiate from the syllables.

original: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes bskul ta /
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes bskul ta /
translated: They invoke the exalted wisdom of all tathāgatas in the ten directions.

original: yi ge bzhi la so so'i thim par bsam zhing /
analyzed: yi ge bzhi la so so'i thim par bsam zhing /
translated: Think that they dissolve into the four syllables.

original: aom a'a: h'um sarbba b'i ra yo gi n'i k'a ya w'a ka tsitta badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
analyzed: aom a'a: h'um sarbba b'i ra yo gi n'i k'a ya w'a ka tsitta badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
translated: Say oṃ āḥ hūṃ sarva vīra yoginī kāya vāk citta vajra svabhāva ātmako ’haṃ.

original: aom yo ga shuddha: sarba dhar'a yo ga shuddho& ham /
analyzed: aom yo ga shuddha: sarba dhar'a yo ga shuddho& ham /
translated: Say oṃ yoga śuddhaḥ sarva dharmā yoga śuddho ’haṃ.

original: zhes brjod pas nga rgyal brtan par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes brjod pas nga rgyal brtan par bya'o //
translated: Through saying that, stabilize the pride.

original: de nas go cha bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: de nas go cha bsam par bya ste /
translated: Then imagine the armor.

original: he ru ka'i snying gar ao ha dkar po dang / mgo bo la na ma hi ser po dang / spyi gtsug tu sv'a h'a hu dmar po dang / phrag pa gnyis su boo sha ta he nag po dang / mig gnyis su h'um h'um ho dmar po dang /
analyzed: he ru ka'i snying gar ao ha dkar po dang / mgo bo la na ma hi ser po dang / spyi gtsug tu sv'a h'a hu dmar po dang / phrag pa gnyis su boo sha ta he nag po dang / mig gnyis su h'um h'um ho dmar po dang /
translated: At the heart of Heruka is white oṃ haṃ, at the head yellow na mo hi, at the crown red svā hā hu, at the two shoulders black vau ṣaṭ he, at the two eyes red hūṃ hūṃ ho,🔽and green phaṭ haṃ on all the limbs.

original: yan lag thams cad la phat ham ljang gu / yum gyi lte bar aom bam dmar po /
analyzed: yan lag thams cad la phat ham ljang gu / yum gyi lte bar aom bam dmar po /
translated: At the navel of the mother is red oṃ vaṃ,

original: snying gar ham yom ya mi ni sngon mo /
analyzed: snying gar ham yom ya mi ni sngon mo /
translated: at the heart blue haṃ yaṃ yamini,

original: kha la hrim mom rmongs byed ma dkar mo /🔽mgo bo la hrem hrim skyod byed ma ser mo /
analyzed: kha la hrim mom rmongs byed ma dkar mo / mgo bo la hrem hrim skyod byed ma ser mo /
translated: At the mouth is white Hriṃ Moṃmoṃ, the Bewilderer.🔽At the head is yellow Hreṃ Hreṃ, the Mover.

original: @206b spyi gtsug tu h'um h'um skrag byed ma ljang gu / yan lag thams cad la phat phat tsandi ka du ba'i mdog can no //
analyzed: @206b spyi gtsug tu h'um h'um skrag byed ma ljang gu / yan lag thams cad la phat phat tsandi ka du ba'i mdog can no //
translated: At the crown of the head is green Hūṃ Hūṃ, the Frightener, and on all the limbs is Phat Phat Caṇḍālī, the color of smoke.

original: de ltar go cha bgos nas ye shes pa spyan drang ba ni /
analyzed: de ltar go cha bgos nas ye shes pa spyan drang ba ni /
translated: Having thus donned the armor, one should invite the awareness beings.

original: sngags dang phyag rgyas mdun gyi nam mkha' la byon par bsam zhing /
analyzed: sngags dang phyag rgyas mdun gyi nam mkha' la byon par bsam zhing /
translated: With mantra and mudra, imagine they arrive in the space in front.

original: dam tshig dang ye shes pa gnyis su med par byas nas /🔽aom yo ga shuddha: sarba dharm'a yo ga shuddho& ham /
analyzed: dam tshig dang ye shes pa gnyis su med par byas nas / aom yo ga shuddha: sarba dharm'a yo ga shuddho& ham /
translated: Make the pledge beings and awareness beings inseparable.

original: zhes pa brjod pas nga rgyal brtan par bya'o //🔽de nas dbang bskur ba'i phyir snying ga'i h'um gi 'od ther gyis ye shes pa spyan drangs nas /
analyzed: zhes pa brjod pas nga rgyal brtan par bya'o // de nas dbang bskur ba'i phyir snying ga'i h'um gi 'od ther gyis ye shes pa spyan drangs nas /
translated: Recite “Oṃ yoga śuddhaḥ sarvadharma yoga śuddho ’haṃ” and stabilize the pride.

original: nam mkha' la byon par bsam mo //
analyzed: nam mkha' la byon par bsam mo //
translated: Then, in order to confer empowerment, imagine that the awareness beings who are invited by the light of the hūṃ at the heart arrive in the sky.

original: de nas phyi nang gsang ba gsum gyis mchod nas gsol ba gdab ste /
analyzed: de nas phyi nang gsang ba gsum gyis mchod nas gsol ba gdab ste /
translated: Then, having made outer, inner, and secret offerings, make the supplication:

original: byang chub rdo rjes sangs rgyas la //
analyzed: byang chub rdo rjes sangs rgyas la //
translated: “Just as Awakened Vajra granted

original: ji ltar mchog gnyis stsol mdzad dang // bdag kyang bsrung ba'i don gyi phyir //
analyzed: ji ltar mchog gnyis stsol mdzad dang // bdag kyang bsrung ba'i don gyi phyir //
translated: and for the sake of protecting me as well,

original: nam mkha'i rdo rje bdag la stsol //🔽zhes gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i rdo rje bdag la stsol // zhes gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
translated: grant me the vajra of space.

original: de nas mi bskyod rdo rje gtso bor gyur pa'i thugs ka nas mkha' 'gro ma bzhi ye shes kyi bum pa thogs nas ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis kyang //🔽de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ltar //
analyzed: de nas mi bskyod rdo rje gtso bor gyur pa'i thugs ka nas mkha' 'gro ma bzhi ye shes kyi bum pa thogs nas ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis kyang // de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ltar //
translated: Then, from the heart of Akṣobhya, the principal figure, the four dakinis holding the wisdom vase come forth and confer the empowerment.🔽Just as at the time of birth🔽all the tathāgatas performed ablutions,

original: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis //
analyzed: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis //
translated: in the same way, with the pure divine water,

original: de bzhin bdag gis khrus bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin bdag gis khrus bya'o //
translated: I too perform the ablution.

original: zhes brjod de dbang bskur ba dang / gtso bos kyang /
analyzed: zhes brjod de dbang bskur ba dang / gtso bos kyang /
translated: The principal figure also says:

original: rdo rje chen po dbang bskur ba //
analyzed: rdo rje chen po dbang bskur ba //
translated: The great vajra empowerment

original: khams gsum pa yis phyag byas pa'i //
analyzed: khams gsum pa yis phyag byas pa'i //
translated: is the homage of the three realms.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum pa'i //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum pa'i //
translated: From the place of the three secrets of all buddhas,

original: gnas las byung ba sbyin par bya //
analyzed: gnas las byung ba sbyin par bya //
translated: I will give the empowerment.

original: zhes brjod cing dbang bskur bas lus kyi phyi nang gi dri ma thams cad dag par bsam mo //
analyzed: zhes brjod cing dbang bskur bas lus kyi phyi nang gi dri ma thams cad dag par bsam mo //
translated: As he says this and confers the empowerment, imagine that all the stains of the body, outer and inner, are purified.

original: dbang yongs su rdzogs nas nang dbang rtags su mi bskyod pa sa gnon gyi phyag rgya can sku mdog sngon po rdo rje dril bu can gyis dbu brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: dbang yongs su rdzogs nas nang dbang rtags su mi bskyod pa sa gnon gyi phyag rgya can sku mdog sngon po rdo rje dril bu can gyis dbu brgyan pa'o //
translated: After the empowerment is completely received, the inner sign of empowerment is the crown ornament of blue Akṣobhya with the mudra of pressing the earth, holding a vajra and a bell.

original: de ltar bskyed pa'i rim pa las skyon bzlas pa bya ste /
analyzed: de ltar bskyed pa'i rim pa las skyon bzlas pa bya ste /
translated: Thus, having generated the creation stage, one should do the recitation.

original: aom shr'i badzra hi he ru ru kam h'um h'um phat /🔽d'a ki ni dz'a la samba ra sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom shr'i badzra hi he ru ru kam h'um h'um phat / d'a ki ni dz'a la samba ra sv'a h'a /
translated: oṃ śrī vajra he he ru ru kaṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ🔽dāki ni jā la saṃ bhāra svāhā🔽is the essence.

original: snying po'o // aom hr'i: ha ha h'um h'um phat /
analyzed: snying po'o // aom hr'i: ha ha h'um h'um phat /
translated: oṃ hrīḥ ha ha hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: nye ba'i snying po'o //
analyzed: nye ba'i snying po'o //
translated: is the near essence.

original: aom sarba buddha d'a ki n'i ye h'um h'um phat /
analyzed: aom sarba buddha d'a ki n'i ye h'um h'um phat /
translated: oṃ sarva buddha dāki niye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: badzra warnna n'i ye h'um h'um phat /
analyzed: badzra warnna n'i ye h'um h'um phat /
translated: vajra varṇanīye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: yul gyi snying po'o //
analyzed: yul gyi snying po'o //
translated: is the essence of the object.

original: badzra bee ro tsa n'i ya h'um h'um phat /
analyzed: badzra bee ro tsa n'i ya h'um h'um phat /
translated: oṃ vajra vairocanīye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: yum gyi nye ba'i snying po'o //🔽aom d'a ki n'i ye h'um h'um phat /
analyzed: yum gyi nye ba'i snying po'o // aom d'a ki n'i ye h'um h'um phat /
translated: is the near essence of the mother.🔽oṃ dāki niye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom l'a ma ye h'um h'um phat /
analyzed: aom l'a ma ye h'um h'um phat /
translated: oṃ la ma ye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom khanda ro he h'um h'um phat /
analyzed: aom khanda ro he h'um h'um phat /
translated: oṃ khaṇḍarohe hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom d'u yi n'i ye h'um h'um phat /
analyzed: aom d'u yi n'i ye h'um h'um phat /
translated: oṃ dū ya ni ye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: phyogs kyi lha mo bzhi'o //
analyzed: phyogs kyi lha mo bzhi'o //
translated: are the four goddesses of the directions.

original: de ltar sngags kyi skyon yon gnyis shes pas /
analyzed: de ltar sngags kyi skyon yon gnyis shes pas /
translated: Thus, knowing the faults and virtues of mantra,

original: ji tsam du bla ma'i gdams ngag gis bzlas par bya'o //🔽de @207a * //
analyzed: ji tsam du bla ma'i gdams ngag gis bzlas par bya'o // de @207a * //
translated: one should recite to the extent of the guru's instructions.

original: nas mnyam gzhag las langs nas rim gyis lha bsdus te /
analyzed: nas mnyam gzhag las langs nas rim gyis lha bsdus te /
translated: Then, having arisen from equipoise, gradually gather the deity

original: dpa' bo gcig pa'i nga rgyal gyis rjes dang spyod lam gyi rnal 'byor bya'o //
analyzed: dpa' bo gcig pa'i nga rgyal gyis rjes dang spyod lam gyi rnal 'byor bya'o //
translated: and perform the subsequent yoga and the yoga of conduct with the pride of being a solitary hero.

original: de nas rdzogs pa'i rim pa la 'jug par 'dod bas /
analyzed: de nas rdzogs pa'i rim pa la 'jug par 'dod bas /
translated: Then, if one wishes to enter the stage of completion,🔽the moon is the path of the messenger,

original: zla ba pho nya'i lam pa dang // nyi ma lus kyi dkyil 'khor te //
analyzed: zla ba pho nya'i lam pa dang // nyi ma lus kyi dkyil 'khor te //
translated: the sun is the maṇḍala of the body,

original: thig le bzhi ni ye shes yin //
analyzed: thig le bzhi ni ye shes yin //
translated: the four bindus are gnosis,

original: yongs su dag pa 'od gsal yin //
analyzed: yongs su dag pa 'od gsal yin //
translated: and the utterly pure is luminosity.

original: dper na nam mkha'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: dper na nam mkha'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: For example, it has the characteristic of space.

original: rang bzhin med pa zung 'jug ste //
analyzed: rang bzhin med pa zung 'jug ste //
translated: The absence of nature is union,

original: bde chen rnam pa gsum gyis bstan //
analyzed: bde chen rnam pa gsum gyis bstan //
translated: which is explained by the three aspects of great bliss.

original: bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni //
analyzed: bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni //
translated: The stage of generation and the stage of completion

original: rnal 'byor pa yi lam khyer ro //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa yi lam khyer ro //
translated: are the yogi’s path integration.

original: dpal bde mchog 'khor lo lha lnga'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
analyzed: dpal bde mchog 'khor lo lha lnga'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
translated: The sādhana of the Five Deities of Śrī Cakrasaṃvara is complete.

original: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa /
analyzed: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa /
translated: Composed by the Indian abbot Śrī Dīpaṃkara Śrījñāna.
